Articles.Content:
Not sure if this is the right section for this, but, I am looking for basic to advanced rocket building tutorials/videos that are accurate and reasonably up to date. Can someone point me in the right direction? 

Thanks!

Try Scott Manley or Marcus House.

Both have very good videos.
Scott Manley has a great selection of you-tube videos
It seems like a bunch of Scott Manley's videos are for older versions of KSP and I'm not sure they apply any longer.

3 hours ago, Bandus said:

It seems like a bunch of Scott Manley's videos are for older versions of KSP and I'm not sure they apply any longer.

The gameplay and some of the design ideas he discusses are just fine for learning.

I play on a PS4 and the 'pc based' you-tube videos are still relevant for  'how-to' purposes.
